test of AuAg-NPs co-deposited TiO 2 NWs for photocatalytic CO 2 reduction with H 2 through a cycling run was conducted.There was no obvious decrease of the photoactivity of AuAg-NPs-loaded TiO 2 after three cyclic runs, demonstrating the good stability of this photo-catalyst.It is generally accepted that the photocatalyst efficiency is mainly dependent on the light absorption ability, surface properties (e.g., specific surface area, pore structure, pore volume, adsorption property etc.) and photo-generated

The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.

evidence.pdf_reference: Plus Spectrophotometer (HORIBA Scientific) with a 600 nm grating and a 532 nm emitting laser as an excitation source.
